attributes.action: Ensure GP Surgeries revert back to seeing patients as a norm.
attributes.background: Health Minister insist that all Surgeries have reverted to system before pandemic whereby patients could book a face to face appointment with a doctor as a norm rather than go through the rigmarole of a phone call from a doctor who will decide if an appointment is necessary.

rejection.details: It is up to individual GP practices how to offer services,  but you may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/587701
